Justin Verlander

Position: Pitcher

Bats: Right  •  Throws: Right

6-5, 240lb (196cm, 108kg)

Team: San Francisco Giants (majors)

Born: February 20, 1983 in Manakin Sabot, VA us

Draft: Drafted by the Detroit Tigers in the 1st round (2nd) of the 2004 MLB June Amateur Draft from Old Dominion University (Norfolk, VA).

High School: Goochland HS (Goochland, VA)

School: Old Dominion University (Norfolk, VA)

Debut: July 4, 2005 (Age 22-134d, 18,708th in major league history)
   vs. CLE 5.1 IP, 7 H, 4 SO, 3 BB, 4 ER, L

Rookie Status: Exceeded rookie limits during 2006 season

2025 Contract Status: Signed thru 2025, 1 yr/$15M (25)

Service Time (01/2025): 19.002  •  Free Agent: 2026

Agents: ISE Baseball • Previously: Richard Verlander

National Team: us USA (College)

Full Name: Justin Brooks Verlander

Nicknames: JV

Pronunciation: \VUHR-land-er\

Instagram: @justinverlander

Frequently Asked Questions

How old is Justin Verlander?

Justin Verlander is 42 years old.

When was Justin Verlander born?

Justin Verlander was born on February 20, 1983.

Where was Justin Verlander born?

Justin Verlander was born in Manakin Sabot, VA.

How tall is Justin Verlander?

Justin Verlander is 6-5 (196 cm) tall.

How much does Justin Verlander weigh?

Justin Verlander weighs 240 lbs (108 kg).

How many seasons has Justin Verlander played?

Justin Verlander is in his 20th season.

When was Justin Verlander drafted?

Justin Verlander was drafted by the Detroit Tigers in the 1st round (2nd) of the 2004 MLB June Amateur Draft from Old Dominion University (Norfolk, VA).

What position does Justin Verlander play?

Justin Verlander is a Pitcher.

How many strikeouts does Justin Verlander have?

Justin Verlander has 60 strikeouts this season and has 3,476 strikeouts over his career.

How much is Justin Verlander worth?

Justin Verlander makes $15,000,000.00 this year. His current contract terms are 1 yr/$15M (25).

How many teams has Justin Verlander played for?

Justin Verlander has played for 4 teams; the Detroit Tigers, Houston Astros, New York Mets and San Francisco Giants.

How many World Series has Justin Verlander won?

Justin Verlander has won 2 World Series.

What is Justin Verlander's Instagram account?

Justin Verlander is on Instagram at justinverlander.

What are Justin Verlander's nicknames?

JV is a nickname for Justin Verlander.
